title: Predictions For 2017
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author makes 105 predictions for 2017, divided into categories of world events, economics, Trump administration, communities, work and personal life. 
- The predictions range from the survival of North Korea's government to Angela Merkel's re-election as chancellor of Germany.

Key learnings:
- The author likes to make predictions for the New Year and score them later. 
- He also reveals some personal information, such as his savings target and relationship status.

Key questions:
- What were Scott's predictions for previous years? 
- Will Scott track his 2017 predictions and score them at the end of the year? 
- What methodology does Scott use to make these predictions?
